name: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup butter or margarine 2 cups flour
1 cup packed brown sugar ½ teaspoon salt
steps: ½ cup sugar 2 teaspoon baking powder
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
Mix in eggs and vanilla. Sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Blend throughly.
Stir in oats and chocolate chips. Mix well. Drop by spoonful onto ungreased cookie sheet.
